items.content_html: The Basic Weather App is a simple and responsive web application designed to fetch and display real-time weather information for any city around the world. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it a lightweight and beginner-friendly project.
items.title: soura07/Basic-Weather-App-Frontend-Static: The Basic Weather App is a simple and responsive web application designed to fetch and display real-time weather information for any city around the world. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it a lightweight and beginner-friendly project.
